column1: Uchi////If you're there for social hour
column2: always get that AND the chef's choice. It sits at $4/pc but the I'm sure the fish rotates based on how much they have in stock or how the chef feels on that particular day
column3: and today they were serving loup de mer--and good God
column4: I had to get another couple pieces after trying it; ontop they accent the fish with a bit of olive oil
column5: a few flakes of kosher salt
column6: and something green (maybe some kind of dill puree?).
